              Kyle Parrish
            
            
              
                
                    
                      
                        
                      
                    
                  
                                    
                    
                      
                        
                      
                    
                  
                                    
                    
                      
                        
                      
                    
                  
                                  
            
          
        
        
        
          
            
            d-title h1 {
              font-size: 0px;
            }
            
            
            PhD Candidate
            
            Rutgers University
            
            I am a PhD Candidate in the Second Language Acquisition and Bilingualism program working with Professor Joseph Casillas in the Spanish and Portuguese Department at Rutgers University, New Brunswick. My main interests are in third language acquisition, phonetics and phonology, and language pedagogy. My primary aim/interest is how bilinguals acquire the phonetics and phonology of a third language. In particular, my research involves Spanish-English bilinguals and their learning of a new language with a focus on near first exposure. My recent projects have involved novel-language production by bilinguals, perception in the same population, and exploratory analysis related to which factors might be associated with the variation observed in cross-linguistic influence from either a first or second language in third language learning. Outside of work and school, I love dogs (I have three), American football (go Panthers!) and language learning.
            
            
            
            
            Interests
            Third Language acquisition
            Phonetics/Phonology
            Second language acquisition
            Bilingualism
            Statistics/Data visualization
            
            
            Education
            
            PhD in Spanish Linguistics, 2023 (Expected) Rutgers University
            
            
            MA in Spanish, 2018 The University of North Carolina at Charlotte
            
            
            BA in Spanish and German, 2016 he University of North Carolina at Charlotte
            
            
            
            
            
          
        
      
    

    
      
        
          
            
              
            
              Kyle Parrish
